text: Ursula Justin (born 1927) is a German stage and film actress.Goble p.1 She starred in six films during the 1950s, all of them directed by her husband Géza von Cziffra. ==Filmography== * Dancing Stars (1952) * The Singing Hotel (1953) * The Flower of Hawaii (1953) * Dancing in the Sun (1954) * Money from the Air (1954) * Bandits of the Autobahn (1955) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:German film actresses Category:German stage actresses Category:People from Altena
title: Ursula Justin
